name: BlasTech E-11B Blaster Rifle
Lore: 'Modified by Alliance armorers who defected from the BlasTech corporation. Expensive cooling system incorporated to allow higher fire rate.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on your scout warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.',
